trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o evento de <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged" /> de <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService" />.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The event model in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] is based on having an event delegate that connects an event with its handler.
trans-unit.target: O modelo de evento no [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] baseia-se de ter um delegado de evento que se conecta a um evento com seu manipulador.

trans-unit.source: To raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, two elements are needed:
trans-unit.target: Para gerar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> evento, são necessários dois elementos:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> class, derived from <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which holds the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> classe derivada de <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=nameWithType>, que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler> delegate, which points to a method that provides the response to the event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler> delegado, que aponta para um método que fornece a resposta ao evento.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler> delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
